hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\blueE2$ tens and $\blueE9$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/0c3d1a7efabad020081cf36100f01d2d00fc535d)

There are $\blueE{29}$ blocks.

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD1$ ten and $\maroonD{6}$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e8d5ea81eb7be49ff8894cdad510d8ae1297be2b)

So, we are subtracting $\maroonD{16}$ blocks.

When we subtract $\blueE{29}-\maroonD{16}$, the difference is $\blueE{13}$ blocks.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/21b8da0e18c3c3c036fda89e867540200e626417)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$29 - 16 = 13$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/4bbcea6aac8b917df4c3bdc2c5068e72c46cde55)

[[☃ radio 1]]
